channel.title: Adding shops with dev. v7 SO CONFUSING!
channel.description:
I want to add a shop in varrock,
but im confused, people say edit the shop.cgf, but i dont see it, the only thing with shop in it is, shophandler, and when i open it it looks weird.
so what do i do

item.title: Adding shops with dev. v7 SO CONFUSING!
item.dc:creator: @pwnm30rdi3 pwnm30rdi3
item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

there should be a named “shops” or “shops.cfg”

When you open you will get something like the following code:

shop = [shop id]	[Name of store]			1	1	[item number]	[amount sold]

Then open you client.java and press ctrl + F and in search box type: WanneShop = 1

Then copy something like the following code:

[code]
} else if (NPCID == 209) { // Nulodian
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 40; // Black Armour Shop
[/code

				} else if (NPCID == NPC ID) { // NPC NAME
					PutNPCCoords = true;
					WanneShop = SHOP ID; // SHOP NAME

Then open “autospawn” or “autospawn.cfg”

and make a new NPC[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Adding shops with dev. v7 SO CONFUSING!

item.title: Adding shops with dev. v7 SO CONFUSING!
item.dc:creator: @Solid_snake1 Solid snake
item.description:
@Solid_snake1 wrote:

try looking in the config or CFG folder and look for shops if need be choose your own program and use notepad
